member.name: P:Sandbox.Services.GamePass.Ident
member.summary: The ident of this game pass. A short name with no special characters.

member.name: P:Sandbox.Services.GamePass.Cost
member.summary: The amount of s&bux this game pass costs.

member.name: P:Sandbox.Services.GamePass.Title
member.summary: Name of the game pass to show in UI.

member.name: P:Sandbox.Services.GamePass.Icon
member.summary: Icon for this game pass. Only works with urls (for now).

member.name: M:Sandbox.Services.Monetization.WaitForLoad
member.summary: It may take a second to get a response from the backend. Use this to ensure everything is loaded.

member.name: M:Sandbox.Services.Monetization.Has(Sandbox.Services.GamePass)
member.summary: If the player owns the game pass.

member.name: M:Sandbox.Services.Monetization.Purchase(Sandbox.Services.GamePass)
member.summary: Prompts the player to purchase the game pass.
member.returns: True if the game pass was bought.
member.remarks: A game pass can be purchased multiple times.

member.name: M:Sandbox.Services.Monetization.HasOrPurchase(Sandbox.Services.GamePass)
member.summary: If the player owns the game pass, if not - prompt a purchase.
